{"id":1231364499,"question_id":3389,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"2Â months","timestamp":1713025078,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"67 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1231364499/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Time to Visit Disappearing Nodes","memory":"106.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int[] minimumTime(int n, int[][] edges, int[] disappear) {\n        Map<Integer, List<int[]>> map = new HashMap<>();\n        for (int[] i : edges) {\n            int x = i[0];\n            int y = i[1];\n            int len = i[2];\n            map.putIfAbsent(x, new ArrayList<>());\n            map.putIfAbsent(y, new ArrayList<>());\n            map.get(x).add(new int[]{y, len});\n            map.get(y).add(new int[]{x, len});\n        }\n\n        PriorityQueue<int[]> pq = new PriorityQueue<>(Comparator.comparingInt(za -> za[1]));\n        pq.offer(new int[]{0, 0});\n\n        int[] ans = new int[n];\n        Arrays.fill(ans, Integer.MAX_VALUE);\n\n        while (!pq.isEmpty()) {\n            int[] curr = pq.poll();\n            int node = curr[0];\n            int time = curr[1];\n\n            if (ans[node] != Integer.MAX_VALUE) {\n                continue;\n            }\n\n            ans[node] = time;\n\n            for (int[] j : map.getOrDefault(node, new ArrayList<>())) {\n                int nextNode = j[0];\n                int nextTime = time + j[1];\n                if (nextTime < disappear[nextNode] && nextTime < ans[nextNode]) {\n                    pq.offer(new int[]{nextNode, nextTime});\n                }\n            }\n        }\n\n         for(int i=0; i<n ; i++){\n            if(ans[i]==Integer.MAX_VALUE){\n                ans[i] = -1;\n            }\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n}\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-time-to-visit-disappearing-nodes","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
